content: I understand how you feel. Bike safety is a major concern in cities, but there are ways to improve the situation. As you said, prioritizing bike infrastructure is a key solution. This can include adding more dedicated bike lanes, protecting bike lanes with barriers or buffers, creating bike priority intersections, and implementing bike lane networks that connect different parts of the city. Additionally, educating both cyclists and motorists on safe cycling practices and rules of the road is crucial to ensure safer conditions for everyone. Above all, promoting active transportation and encouraging cycling as a sustainable mode of transport can make a significant difference in ensuring safer streets and a cleaner environment for all.
